title: Some Other Dusk
description: A laugh-out-loud romantic comedy!  What if your husband, who died a month ago, appeared suddenly in your room saying that he is not actually dead? He just became a ... VAMPIRE? Would you believe it?  In an attempt to uncover the truth, Marcia goes through a bizarre and hilarious journey: an exotic fortune teller, an exorcist, a medicine man, a ufologist, among other and even stranger characters. Is she going crazy or does she simply need to adapt to a new reality - becoming a vampireÂ´s wife?  "Some other dusk" tells the story of this unusual romance between Marcia and Nicholas: a couple that even death may not part.
author: Renata M. Cardoso
